data.quote: The difficult is what takes a little time; the impossible is what takes a little longer.
data.author: Fridtjof Nansen

data.quote: Braving obstacles and hardships is nobler than retreat to tranquility.
data.author: Khalil Gibran

data.quote: Cultivation of mind should be the ultimate aim of human existence.
data.author: B. R. Ambedkar

data.quote: You have brains in your head and feet in your shoes, you can steer yourself in any direction you choose.
data.author: Dr. Seuss

data.quote: The mind that tries to shape tomorrow beyond its capacities will find no rest.
data.author: Rumi

data.quote: One day you will wake up and there won't be any more time to do the things you've always wanted. Do it now
data.author: Paulo Coelho

data.quote: The measure of who we are is what we do with what we have.
data.author: Vince Lombardi

data.quote: As we express our gratitude, we must never forget that the highest appreciation is not to utter words, but to live by them.
data.author: John F. Kennedy

data.quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
data.author: Sam Levenson

data.quote: Success is not the result of spontaneous combustion. You must set yourself on fire.
data.author: Reggie Leach

data.quote: Always remember that the future comes one day at a time.
data.author: Dean Acheson

data.quote: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
data.author: Jim Ryun

data.quote: The greatest mistake you can make in life is to be continually fearing you will make one.
data.author: Elbert Hubbard

data.quote: The secret to happiness is freedom. And the secret to freedom is courage.
data.author: Thucydides

data.quote: The struggle ends when the gratitude begins.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: Success is not the result of spontaneous combustion. You must set yourself on fire.
data.author: Reggie Leach

data.quote: Obsessed is a word that the lazy use to describe the dedicated.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: I can't change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination.
data.author: Jimmy Dean

data.quote: Set your goals high, and don't stop till you get there.
data.author: Bo Jackson

data.quote: Your life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change.
data.author: Anonymous

data.quote: I never knew a man come to greatness or eminence who lay abed late in the morning.
data.author: Johnathan Swift

data.quote: No matter how you feel, Get up, dress up, show up and never give up.
data.author: Anonymous

data.quote: To be beautiful means to be yourself. You don't need to be accepted by others. You need to be yourself.
data.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

data.quote: Believe that life is worth living and your belief will help create the fact.
data.author: William James

data.quote: You're going to go through tough times - that's life. But I say, 'Nothing happens to you, it happens for you.' See the positive in negative events.
data.author: Joel Osteen

data.quote: Yesterday is not ours to recover, but tomorrow is ours to win or lose.
data.author: Lyndon B. Johnson

data.quote: I demolish my bridges behind me...then there is no choice but to move forward.
data.author: Fridtjof Nansen
